lead_paragraph: A study by Unicef, the World Health Organization and other health agencies suggests that vaccines saved 20.3 million young lives between 2000 and 2015, but that there are still problem areas.

headline.print_headline: Despite Gains, Measles Kills 350 Each Day
headline.main: Despite Vaccination Efforts Measles Kills 350 Children a Day, Report Says

snippet: A study by Unicef, the World Health Organization and other health agencies suggests that vaccines saved 20.3 million young lives between 2000 and 2015, but that there are still problem areas....
